text: The Star Flyer is a steel inverted roller coaster located in Star City in Pasay, Metro Manila, Philippines. This is the first inverted roller coaster ride in the Philippines. ==Ride elements== *Lift hill *Roll over ==Ride layout== The ride layout includes a curving first drop into a two inversion roll over element and the inversions, the trains run through two helix-like turns before returning to the station. It has 3 trains with 5 cars per train. Riders are arranged 2 across in a single row for a total of 10 riders per train. == Incidents == In 2009, a man died after falling from the ride. A witness said the man body hit the metal framing of the ride before finally falling to the ground. The Star Flyer is among the few rides which survived a fire on October 2, 2019 which destroyed most of the amusement park. == References == == External links == * Official site Category:Inverted roller coasters Category:Roller coasters introduced in 2007 Category:Buildings and structures completed in 2007 Category:Steel roller coasters Category:Roller coasters in the Philippines
title: Star Flyer (roller coaster)
